text: Wizards is a 1977 American animated science fiction fantasy movie directed by Ralph Bakshi and starring Bob Holt, Jesse Welles, Richard Romanus, David Proval, Steve Gravers and Mark Hamill. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. The movie is about a battle between Avatar, a wizard who uses magic and his evil brother, Blackwolf, a wizard who uses technology. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 science fiction movies Category:1977 fantasy movies Category:1970s animated movies Category:American animated movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Ralph Bakshi Category:Movies about elves Category:Movies about wizards Category:Movies about fairies and sprites Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies about brothers Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:1977 adventure movies Category:Movies set in the future Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:Robot movies Category:American satirical movies
title: Wizards (movie)
